title: Volunteer
text: The most valuable volunteering experience for me was that I was one of the orientation leaders for new undergraduate students last summer. During discover week, I talk with my orientees (students in my orientation group) who are from various backgrounds and help them smoothly transmit into college life even after the discover weekends. Having small talks with my orientees whenever I came across them around campus and learning about their colorful college life gave me self-affirmation.

title: Shuheng Kong
text:
I am Shuheng Kong and my preferred name is Harry. I am planning to pursue a Master of Science degree in Biostatistics. I am particularly interested in expanding my knowledge and skills in biostatistics to tackle complex challenges in public health, clinical trials, and epidemiology. During my Masterâ€™s program, I aim to go deeper into topics such as survival analysis, longitudinal data analysis, and Bayesian statistics.
In the long term, I aspire to pursue a PhD in Biostatistics to further advance my expertise and make significant contributions to the field.
